Package components

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
components.Grid
public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
Representation of the Grid portion of the Game board

Consitst of n Box in an internal array of boxes

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Samuel Brenner

  • Field Details

    • BOX_WIDTH

      public static final int BOX_WIDTH
      Global variable representing the width of each Box lying on this Grid

  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid​(int x, int y)
      Constructor for this Grid

      Constructs on an (x, y) pair that holds the origin point in the upper left, as like other drawing components

      Parameters:
      x - initial x coordinate
      y - initial y coordinate

  • Method Details

    • checkWin

      public java.lang.Object[] checkWin()
      Determines if the state of this Grid is one of a win Only called when the number of objects on the board is 2 * Main.GAME_SIZE - 1
      Returns:
      Object array of at least a Boolean, true if the current state of this Grid is a win, and an additional ShapeTag if the state is a win

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the Shape objects from the Grid

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the Grid and all of its components to the JPanel
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics for painting to JPanel

    • filledBoxes

      public int filledBoxes()
      Accesses number of filled boxes on this Grid
      Returns:
      number of Box objects filled in this.boxes

    • isFilled

      public boolean isFilled()
      Returns true if all the Box objects in the interal array are filled with Shape objects
      Returns:
      true if all the boxes in this Grid are filled with Shapes

    • placeShape

      public boolean placeShape​(ShapeTag tag, int x, int y)
      Adds a Shape to the Grid
      Parameters:
      tag - ShapeTag identifier as to what kind of Shape to place in a Box
      x - x location of cursor
      y - y location of cursor
      Returns:
      true if a Shape of type tag was added to the Grid
